WorkItem.Description:
Hi

I insert data from my mysql database on my sheet with php 'while' and i want to apply border to each cell i insert.

Set value work fine but if i add :

```
$objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->getStyleByColumnAndRow(0,$q)->applyFromArray($styleThinBlackBorderOutline);
```

only cell 1 to 32 got border, others cells don't have border and loose native style (centered text,bold...)

I don't understand why setvalue work fine and not applystyle
